name: Connection (Douzane, Avilla, SusanOliveira, Sam Cavalheiro, GrerK, Lucas Laport, Dionisio_3D, lucasfaial, Feligon, Phoenyn, PaulaAraujo)
name_original: Connection (Douzane, Avilla, SusanOliveira, Sam Cavalheiro, GrerK, Lucas Laport, Dionisio_3D, lucasfaial, Feligon, Phoenyn, PaulaAraujo)
description:
Many years in the future, mankind has found a way to travel great distances in space, but for that they needed a resource found only a faraway planet. With that, several colonies were created there, in order to harvest this resource.

However, one of these colonies is attacked by alien beings native to the planet. Players control two survivors equipped with their mechs as they try to reactivate the colony's energy so they can search for other survivors and other colonies while trying to understand the reason for the mysterious attack.

Cooperation - Grab a friend and take control of two mechs, and combine their's funcionalities.

Exploration - Explore the Xuun's Valley while looking for repair equipment to fix the communication towers, face creatures, discover new hidden weapons and advance in your mission.

Combat - Face alien creatures using various weapons equipped in your mecha, while combining their powers with your friend mech weapons as well.

Flow's first game as a team, yey. We hope you enjoy it.
If you liked the game, please consider leaving us a message.

  • The game has from 10 to 20 minutes of gameplay.
  • You can play it with a controller and a keyboard as well.
  • Can only be played on local co-op.
